comment.author: 29350288@N06
comment._content:
View is from doorway of the A & P grocery store at the downtown lake corner of Royal and St. Peter Streets, French Quarter, looking across towards the Pedesclaux-Lemonnier House diagonally across the intersection. 

Earlier upload as a gif to ARC - Archival Research Catalog gives the date as May 1972.

Only the foreground is in sharp focus, showing portion of a motorcycle (including a cross shaped mirror) parked on the sidewalk. Beyond in blurred focus can be seen pedestrians, auto traffic heading back on St. Peter Street. Two people are seated in street at left; one with guitar case; likely they are street musicians.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Infrogmation- thanks for the extra details and the tags; they're much appreciated!

-Kristen (U.S. National Archives)
